channel.title: Giving Note Page Bingos
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Giving Note Page Bingos" - Lv50-ish, only those who are not currently Bingo'd.

item.title: Re: Giving Note Page Bingos
item.content:encoded: Tatze Lvl 35 of Wiki Redux needs a Notepagebingo

item.title: Re: Giving Note Page Bingos
item.content:encoded: I no longer need to be bingo'd (someone already tagged me), but I'll see if I can hit you after dayroll tomorrow. (I'm currently out of stamina, and what I get for the rest of the day will need to go to a Special Mission I have to start.)

item.title: Re: Giving Note Page Bingos
item.content:encoded: I'm lvl. 45, Chrona, in Thought Village. I can bingo you back. In 2 hours I'll be un-bingo'd, so then you can bingo me.

item.title: Re: Giving Note Page Bingos
item.content:encoded: Only one page left, now looking for a straight-up Bingo trade: I Note Bingo you, you Note Bingo me.

item.title: Giving Note Page Bingos
item.content:encoded:
I've got some Note Page I'm looking to fire off, and I'd rather they were written to people who actually want it. I'm Lv50, and obvious preference is going to be given to people in my same level range, in non-peaceful villages, particularly those whom I'm already spying on. Please do not request a Bingo here if you have already requested one elsewhere, or request one elsewhere after you have done so here; I will check ASAP to see if I am able to Bingo you, and if not, I will tell you so you can go look for someone else to do it.

Obviously, make sure to turn off your Note-proofing.
